Package jchess

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chat
    Class representing the game chat Players are in touch and can write a messages to each other
    Chessboard
    Class to represent chessboard.
    Client
    Class responsible for clients references: for running game, for joing the game, adding moves
    Clock
    Class to represent seperate wall-clock for one player.
    DrawLocalSettings
    Class responsible for drawing the fold with local game settings
    DrawNetworkSettings
    Class responible for drawing Network Settings, when player want to start a game on a network
    GameClock
    Class to representing the full game time
    GameOld
    Class responsible for the starts of new games, loading games, saving it, and for ending it.
    GUI
    Class representing the game interface which is seen by a player and where are lockated available for player opptions, current games and where can he start a new game (load it or save it)
    JChessAboutBox  
    JChessApp
    The main class of the application.
    JChessTabbedPane  
    JChessView
    The application's main frame.
    MD5
    Class responsible for hashing the messages
    Moves
    Class representing the players moves, it's also checking that the moves taken by player are correct.
    NewGameWindow  
    PawnPromotionWindow
    Class responsible for promotion of a pawn.
    Piece
    Class to represent a piece (any kind) - this class should be extended to represent pawn, bishop etc.
    Server
    Class responsible for server references: For running the server, settings of the players, for clients references on the server and references of observators
    Settings
    Class representings game settings available for the current player
    Square
    Class to represent a chessboard square
    ThemeChooseWindow  
    VoidTest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Server.connection_info  
    Settings.colors  
    Settings.gameModes  
    Settings.gameTypes  
    Settings.playerTypes
